snippet.title: Trailer Write'n'Slash
snippet.description:
Made for ISART Digital Game Week 2019.

Write'n'Slash is a text-based hack'n slash.

Credits:

Game Designer: 
Valentin SERRI

Game Programers: 
Maxence BEAUMONT
Clément CAPPANNELLI

Game Artists: 
Sottheavid CHHUON
Vassili Dreschmann
Marie M'HAMMED-OUBELLA
Nicolas VONG
Lynn WILLIAMS

Music & Sound Designers:
Kevin DEDOU
Ge DING

Special thanks to the playtesters, teachers and ISART Digital.
